entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is described as having blond hair and a rosy complexion, making him look like an overgrown schoolboy.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is not explicitly mentioned in the text, but it can be inferred that he is related to Bagman.

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: Arthur is described as an old man and is referred to by Bagman.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is introduced as Mr. Weasley's son and is described as wanting to make a good impression.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is described as running his department in a way that disapproves Percy.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is introduced as the father of Percy and is described as grinning.

entities.name: ministry wizards
entities.description: The Ministry wizards are described as being haggard-looking and rushing past Bagman.

relationships.description: Bagman is related to Crouch, but the nature of their relationship is not specified in the text.
Percy is introduced as Mr. Weasley's son.
Ludo Bagman runs his department, which includes the Ministry wizards.
